ABOUT TEXT: As a passionate software developer, I have a solid foundation in software development with over seven years of experience working with C#. I have experience developing RESTful web APIs using ASP.NET Core, using frameworks such as Entity Framework, Onion Architecture, CQRS and Mediator patterns. I am familiar with containerization and server deployment using Docker.
